article_text:
The Journal welcomes tips and story ideas from the public. For immediate, breaking news, call the newsroom at 785-823-6464, ext. 150. You may fax news releases to the Journal at 785-827-6363 (the sports fax is 785-827-6060) You may e-mail news releases to news@salina.com.

Submit news online

article_metadata.author:
TIM HORAN
Salina Journal

og.description: McPHERSON — Dr. Andrea Herrera plans to take the practice of visiting the family doctor back 100 years.
og.title: Health care on 'steroids'
